import React from 'react' import { Tilt } from 'react-tilt' const TiltjsPractice = () => { const defaultOptions = { reverse: false, // reverse the tilt direction max: 50, // max tilt rotation (degrees) perspective: 1000, // Transform perspective, the lower the more extreme the tilt gets. scale: 1.1, // 2 = 200%, 1.5 = 150%, etc.. speed: 1000, // Speed of the enter/exit transition transition: true, // Set a transition on enter/exit. axis: null, // What axis should be disabled. Can be X or Y. reset: false, // If the tilt effect has to be reset on exit. easing: "cubic-bezier(.03,.98,.52,.99)", // Easing on enter/exit. } return (

TiltjsPractice

{/*
*/}
tilt
) } export default TiltjsPractice
